scripts.build-go: cd go && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -ldflags "-s -w" -o ../public/starlark.wasm ./main.go
scripts.build-go-dev: cd go && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o ../public/starlark.wasm ./main.go
scripts.release: rm -rf ./dist && npm run build-go && npm run build && npm publish --access public
